attributes.action: I want the government to close schools until early 2021 NOW IS TOO EARLY
attributes.additional_details: Parents all around the uk and panicking about there children going back to school because more and more kids everyday are becoming ill with COVID 19 symptoms. I want the government to close schools until they are certain there will be no more cases and our kids can go back to school worry free. Children ages from 11-18 60% of them have anxiety and going back to school knowing there’s a risk is harming there mental well-being we need to sure it’s safe for our kids to return to school.
attributes.background: Due to the COVID 19 virus children have has a long period of time off school but going back now isn’t the right move as the cases are rising again I want the government to close schools until early 2021 to prevent a second wake and to put all out minds at rest.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Keep schools closed until Covid 19 is no longer a threat: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316404

Halt the reopening of schools until the NEU's 5 tests are met: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321101

Keep schools closed in the UK until an effective Cov-19 vaccine is available: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319292  

Delay opening of schools until Test Track and Trace for Covid 19 is working: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320891
